headline: Teamsters Local 727 Members and Officers Unanimously Rejects Request by PepsiCo Beverages North America to Sign Non-Disclosure Agreements
summary: Teamsters Local 727 members and officers are unanimously rejecting a request by PepsiCo Beverages North America that they sign non-disclosure agreements as a condition of receiving information about...

headline: PepsiCo Announces Timing and Availability of Fourth-Quarter and Full-Year 2024 Financial Results
summary: PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ: PEP) today announced that it will issue its fourth-quarter and full-year 2024 (ending December 28) financial results and other related information on Tuesday, February 4, 2025 by posting the following materials and links on the company's website at: https://www.pepsico.com/investors.
